definition: to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

sentences.english: And it shall come to pass, that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved.
sentences.chinese: 到那时候，凡求告主名的，就必得救。

sentences.english: There he built an altar to the Lord and called on the name of the Lord .
sentences.chinese: 他在那里又为耶和华筑了一座坛，求告耶和华的名。

sentences.english: Hear my voice when I call to you.
sentences.chinese: 我求告你的时候，愿你留心听我的声音。

sentences.english: I called upon thy name, O LORD, out of the low dungeon.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华阿，我从深牢中求告你的名。

sentences.english: I cried out to him with my mouth; his praise was on my tongue.
sentences.chinese: 我曾用口求告他，我的舌头，也称他为高。

sentences.english: I cried unto him with my mouth, and he was extolled with my tongue.
sentences.chinese: 我曾用口求告他，我的舌头，也称他为高。

sentences.english: Thou drewest near in the day that I called upon thee: thou saidst, Fear not.
sentences.chinese: 求告你的日子，你临近我，说，不要惧怕。

sentences.english: Trust me in your times of trouble, and I will rescue you, and you will give me glory.
sentences.chinese: 并要在患难之日求告我，我必搭救你。

sentences.english: For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved.
sentences.chinese: 因为凡求告主名的，就必得救。

sentences.english: At noon Elijah began to taunt them. 'Shout louder!' he said.
sentences.chinese: 到了正午，以利亚嬉笑他们，说，大声求告吧。

sentences.english: To the Lord I cry aloud, and he answers me from his holy hill.
sentences.chinese: 我用我的声音求告耶和华，他就从他的圣山上应允我。

sentences.english: No one calls on your name or strives to lay hold of you;
sentences.chinese: 并且无人求告你的名，无人奋刀抓住你。

sentences.english: And everyone who calls on the name of the Lord will be saved.
sentences.chinese: 到那时候，凡求告主名的，就必得救。

sentences.english: Will he delight himself in the Almighty? will he always call upon God?
sentences.chinese: 他岂以全能者为乐，随时求告神呢。

sentences.english: What is the Psalmist asking in this prayer?
sentences.chinese: 诗篇作者在这个祷告中求告什么？

definition: memorial tablet in a temple commemorating a deceased father
to right wrongs/to redress an injustice
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
to confer a favor on sb/to confer a benefit
to appeal for justice/to demand redress for a grievance
